name: Baked Pretzels
author: Nancy
summary: Pretzels where the dough is mixed in the bread machine.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
directions: Measure first 6 ingredients in order listed into baking pan
Select: Dough/Pasta Setting and press start
When the cycle is complete remove dough to a lightly floured surface
If necessary, knead in enough flour to make dough easy to handle
With a sharp knife, cut into eighteen 14X1/2 inch strips
Gently pull each strip into a rope 16 inches long
To shape into pretzels: Curve ends of each rope to make a circle; cross ends at top
Twist ends once and lay over bottom of circle
Combine lightly beaten egg and 1tablespoon water; brush on pretzels
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 18-20 minutes or until done
Remove from sheets and let pretzels cool on wire rack
